replacement.value: The user can set a pair of ciphertext and plaintext as inputs for the component "M-138 Analyzer".
This template shows a known-plaintext attack on M-138.

As a result, the user receives a set of possible keys that map the given plaintext to the given ciphertext. For each possible offset, one set of keys is given by the format\line strip1, strip2, ... / offset\line In case there are positions where multiple strips could be used, the output will have the following format:\line strip1, [strip2|strip3], ... / offset\line This means that on position 2 of the key both, strip1 and strip2, are possible.
